name: Shazam
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

api_methods.name: songs/get-count
api_methods.description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

utterances.utterance: How many times has the song with key 40333609 been shazamed?
Show me the total number of detections for the song with key 12345678.
What is the shazam count for the track identified by key 98765432?
Get the total times the song with key 55555555 has been recognized on Shazam.
Tell me how many people have shazamed the song with key 24681357.
Find out the detection count for the song with key 11223344.
How popular is the song with key 76543210 based on Shazam detections?
Can you tell me the total number of times the song with key 31415926 has been shazamed?
What is the total detection count for the song with key 80808080?
Give me the number of times the song with key 20202020 has been identified on Shazam.
